text: is a Japanese professional football clubJsoccer.com, "Japan J.League Teams" ; retrieved 2012-7-5. in Kashiwa, which is about an hour northeast of Tokyo in Chiba Prefecture.Soccerway.com, "Kashiwa Reysol"; retrieved 2012-3-2. ==History== The club was founded in 1940. *1940-1992 Hitachi SC *1993-present Kashiwa Reysol ==League title== *Japan Soccer League Division 1 : 1 **1972 *Japan Soccer League Division 2 : 1 **1990/91 *J2 League : 1 **2010 ==League position== *2011 : J1 League - Champions *2012 : J1 League - 6th *2013 : J1 League - 10th *2014 : J1 League - 4th *2015 : J1 League - 10th *2016 : J1 League - 8th *2017 : J1 League - 4th *2018 : J1 League - 17th *2019 : J2 League - 1st *2020 : J1 League - 7th ===Former position=== == Notable achievement == The team has some notable achievements. In 2012, Masakatsu Sawa made three goals in one game against Gamba Osaka.WorldFootball.net, "3 Goals in one game"; retrieved 2012-7-5. ==Related pages == * Sports in Japan * List of Japanese football teams * List of Kashiwa Reysol players == References == ==Other websites== * Kashiwa Reysol website ; http://www.reysol.co.jp/main.php * J.League Club Guide Category:1940 establishments in Asia Category:1940s establishments in Japan Category:Football clubs in Chiba Prefecture
title: Kashiwa Reysol
